Text: The Housing Council, which met on Aug. 21, recommended a 15-year, 100 percent abatement based on the amount of the investment and benefit to Sidney's downtown and community.
Cause: the amount of the investment and benefit to Sidney's downtown and community.
Effect: The Housing Council, which met on Aug. 21, recommended a 15-year, 100 percent abatement
Sentence: <e2>The Housing Council, which met on Aug. 21, recommended a 15-year, 100 percent abatement</e2> based on <e1>the amount of the investment and benefit to Sidney's downtown and community.</e1>
